title: BRIEF-Pfizer Granted FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation For Trumenba® (Meningococcal Group B Vaccine)
text:
April 23, 2018 / 12:00 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Pfizer Granted FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation For Trumenba® (Meningococcal Group B Vaccine) Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Pfizer Inc: 
* PFIZER GRANTED FDA BREAKTHROUGH THERAPY DESIGNATION FOR TRUMENBA® (MENINGOCOCCAL GROUP B VACCINE) FOR THE PREVENTION OF INVASIVE MENINGOCOCCAL B DISEASE IN CHILDREN AGES 1 TO 9 YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
